org.forgerock.opendj.ldap

Class Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.Functions

  • public final class Functions
extends Object
    Common Function implementations which may be used when parsing attributes.
    See Also:
    Entry.parseAttribute(org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.AttributeDescription), Attribute.parse(), AttributeParser

    • Method Detail

      • compose

        public static <M,X,N> Function<M,N,Void> compose(Function<M,X,Void> first,
                                 Function<X,N,Void> second)
        Returns the composition of two functions. The result of the first function will be passed to the second.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The type of input values transformed by this function.
        N - The type of output values returned by this function.
        X - The type of intermediate values passed between the two functions.
        Parameters:
        first - The first function which will consume the input.
        second - The second function which will produce the result.
        Returns:
        The composition.

      • composeFirstP

        public static <M,X,N,P> Function<M,N,P> composeFirstP(Function<M,X,P> first,
                                      Function<X,N,Void> second)
        Returns the composition of two functions. The result of the first function will be passed to the second. The first function will be passed an additional parameter.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The type of input values transformed by this function.
        N - The type of output values returned by this function.
        X - The type of intermediate values passed between the two functions.
        P - The type of the additional parameter to the first function's apply method. Use Void for functions that do not need an additional parameter.
        Parameters:
        first - The first function which will consume the input.
        second - The second function which will produce the result.
        Returns:
        The composition.

      • composeSecondP

        public static <M,X,N,P> Function<M,N,P> composeSecondP(Function<M,X,Void> first,
                                       Function<X,N,P> second)
        Returns the composition of two functions. The result of the first function will be passed to the second. The second function will be passed an additional parameter.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The type of input values transformed by this function.
        N - The type of output values returned by this function.
        X - The type of intermediate values passed between the two functions.
        P - The type of the additional parameter to the second function's apply method. Use Void for functions that do not need an additional parameter.
        Parameters:
        first - The first function which will consume the input.
        second - The second function which will produce the result.
        Returns:
        The composition.

      • fixedFunction

        public static <M,N,P> Function<M,N,Void> fixedFunction(Function<M,N,P> function,
                                       P p)
        Returns a function which which always invokes function with p.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The type of input values transformed by this function.
        N - The type of output values return by this function.
        P - The type of the additional parameter to this function's apply method. Use Void for functions that do not need an additional parameter.
        Parameters:
        function - The function to wrap.
        p - The parameter which will always be passed to function.
        Returns:
        A function which which always invokes function with p.

      • identityFunction

        public static <M> Function<M,M,Void> identityFunction()
        Returns a function which always returns the value that it was provided with.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The type of values transformed by this function.
        Returns:
        A function which always returns the value that it was provided with.

      • normalizeString

        public static Function<String,String,Void> normalizeString()
        Returns a function which converts a String to lower case using StaticUtils.toLowerCase(org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.ByteSequence, java.lang.StringBuilder) and then trims it.
        Returns:
        A function which converts a String to lower case using StaticUtils.toLowerCase(org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.ByteSequence, java.lang.StringBuilder) and then trims it.

      • objectToByteString

        public static Function<Object,ByteString,Void> objectToByteString()
        Returns a function which converts an Object to a ByteString using the ByteString.valueOf(Object) method.
        Returns:
        A function which converts an Object to a ByteString .

      • stringToAttributeDescription

        public static Function<String,AttributeDescription,Void> stringToAttributeDescription()
        Returns a function which parses AttributeDescriptions using the default schema. Invalid values will result in a LocalizedIllegalArgumentException.
        Returns:
        A function which parses AttributeDescriptions.

      • stringToAttributeDescription

        public static Function<String,AttributeDescription,Void> stringToAttributeDescription(Schema schema)
        Returns a function which parses AttributeDescriptions using the provided schema. Invalid values will result in a LocalizedIllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        schema - The schema to use for decoding attribute descriptions.
        Returns:
        A function which parses AttributeDescriptions.

      • stringToBoolean

        public static Function<String,Boolean,Void> stringToBoolean()
        Returns a function which parses Boolean values. The function will accept the values 0, false, no, off, 1, true, yes, on. All other values will result in a NumberFormatException.
        Returns:
        A function which parses Boolean values.

      • stringToDN

        public static Function<String,DN,Void> stringToDN()
        Returns a function which parses DNs using the default schema. Invalid values will result in a LocalizedIllegalArgumentException .
        Returns:
        A function which parses DNs.

      • stringToDN

        public static Function<String,DN,Void> stringToDN(Schema schema)
        Returns a function which parses DNs using the provided schema. Invalid values will result in a LocalizedIllegalArgumentException .
        Parameters:
        schema - The schema to use for decoding DNs.
        Returns:
        A function which parses DNs.

        Returns:
        A function which parses generalized time strings.
